name: Lily and Bosch
description:
In the heart of New England, nestled away from public view, sits Magic City, the largest refuge for supernatural creatures and magic wielders in America.  If you can ignore the litter, the rampant property destruction, and the occasional unnatural disaster, Magic City is an adequate-at-best place to call home!  Living in a city built by magicians with all the boons of modern technology might seem like a lot of fun, but for Lily, the daughter of a powerful witch born without any magic of her own, it’s more of an inconvenience.  Thankfully, she’s got good company in her up-right walking, sass talking cat familiar Bosch.  The two inseparable friends can’t help but to get themselves in trouble. 

In tonight’s episode, the exceptionally thoughtful pair remembers their pal Richard’s birthday mere hours before the party.  Having volunteered to supply the cake, the two search the city for four bizarrely rare ingredients to bake a tasty dessert, keep their promise, and celebrate their friend’s very special day!

This vertical slice is the tutorial / proof of concept for a larger, point-and-click adventure game.
